summary:
Old Donald - Fred Trump, father of Donald Trump, was born in 1905, he was known for his business acumen and was a significant figure in the American real estate industry. He founded the Trump Organization, which would later be taken over by his son, Donald Trump.

 About $FRED - $FRED is about to shake up the meme world big time! We’re building a Trump Tower right here, making it the new landmark! $FRED isn’t just about wealth and power, it’s about inclusivity. No BS discriminatory policies here—if you’re a holder, welcome to our Meme Tower!

 TOKENOMICS - Please note that $FRED is a cryptocurrency created purely for entertainment purposes and is not associated with or endorsed by Fred Trump. While $FRED Memecoin may reference or include elements related to Fred Trump’s persona or image, it does not imply any direct endorsement, partnership, or approval.
